evidence.description: Open cholecystectomy performed for biliary atresia.

evidence.excerpt: Liver biopsy taken from left lobe.

evidence.description: Assistant surgeon participated in the procedure.
evidence.excerpt: Assistant surgeon Dr. Bell participated throughout.

complianceIssues.description: Liver biopsy (47100) may be bundled with cholecystectomy (47600).
complianceIssues.violationDetails: MUE Edit: CPT code 47100 may be considered a component of 47600. Review documentation for distinct procedural service.
